column4: hello, i just mounted a bin file in furius mount and inside there should be videos, but it converted everything to a WMV, whaty am i doing wrong?
a wmv is a video, can you give more info?
ok let me test something then
ok now its telling me this: The requested plugins are:
have you installed ubuntu-restricted-extras  ?
i doubt i have
in terminal type - sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
lot of magic happening right now
have you got it working?
downloaded fine, still same error
The requested plugins are:
see this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Medibuntu
have you tried renaming the file with an asf extension instead of wmv ?
might be worth a go just to see
???? how did you try and rename it?
close the file if it's already open, then in terminal type - sudo mv ccent01.wmv ccent01.asf
then try again, what player are you using ?
have you already played this particular file in windows 7?
DRM ??
it worked fine in win7 wpuld DRM just affect linux?
have you tried playing this file with mplayer from the terminal?
no
